description: The Ginger Rickey is a perfect drink for those looking to up their game when mixing cocktails. This invigorating take on the classic&nbsp;Gin and Tonic fuses two of our favorite things: delicious berry juices and a burst of fizziness by&nbsp;ginger beer!It can be all topped off nicely in a custom-made punchbowl that you can serve individually or share at your next party!
